html:
Project Definition & Design

  • Finalize product requirements document and detailed scope definition by Q3.
  • Complete comprehensive user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design wireframes.
  • Secure all necessary technical architecture approvals and resource allocation for development.

Core Development Phase

  • Achieve functional alpha prototype with all primary features implemented by end of Q4.
  • Integrate key third-party APIs and backend services successfully for seamless operation.
  • Conduct internal technical review and initial performance benchmarks for system stability.

Quality Assurance & Iteration

  • Complete comprehensive system integration testing (SIT) and user acceptance testing (UAT).
  • Address all critical bugs and high-priority feedback identified during beta testing.
  • Finalize security audit and compliance checks to meet all regulatory standards.

Market Readiness & Launch

  • Develop and approve all marketing collateral, press releases, and launch strategy plans.
  • Train customer support teams and prepare comprehensive documentation for product release.
  • Monitor initial performance metrics and gather post-launch user feedback for first iteration.
